005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup;
007
008import com.vladsch.flexmark.html.HtmlRenderer;
009import com.vladsch.flexmark.parser.Parser;
010import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.ast.Block;
011import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.ast.Document;
012import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.ast.Node;
013import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.data.DataSet;
014import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.data.MutableDataSet;
015import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.misc.Extension;
016
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.flexmark.FlexmarkConfiguration;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.flexmark.FlexmarkFactory;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.flexmark.SuppressPTagExtension;
020
021import java.util.Collection;
022import java.util.LinkedList;
023import java.util.List;
024
025import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
026
027public final class MarkupLine
028    extends AbstractMarkupString<MarkupLine> {
029
030  @NonNull
031  private static final DataSet FLEXMARK_CONFIG = newParserOptions();
032
033  @NonNull
034  private static final FlexmarkFactory FLEXMARK_FACTORY = FlexmarkFactory.newInstance(FLEXMARK_CONFIG);
035
036  @SuppressWarnings("null")
037  @NonNull
038  private static DataSet newParserOptions() {
039    MutableDataSet options = new MutableDataSet();
040    // disable inline HTML
041    options.set(Parser.HTML_BLOCK_PARSER, false);
042    // disable list processing
043    options.set(Parser.LIST_BLOCK_PARSER, false);
044    options.set(HtmlRenderer.SUPPRESS_HTML_BLOCKS, true);
045
046    Collection<Extension> currentExtensions = Parser.EXTENSIONS.get(FlexmarkConfiguration.FLEXMARK_CONFIG);
047    List<Extension> extensions = new LinkedList<>(currentExtensions);
048    extensions.add(SuppressPTagExtension.newInstance());
049    Parser.EXTENSIONS.set(options, extensions);
050
051    return FlexmarkConfiguration.newFlexmarkConfig(options);
052  }
053
054  /**
055   * Convert the provided HTML string into markup.
056   *
057   * @param html
058   *          the HTML
059   * @return the markup instance
060   */
061  @NonNull
062  public static MarkupLine fromHtml(@NonNull String html) {
063    return new MarkupLine(
064        parseHtml(html, FLEXMARK_FACTORY.getFlexmarkHtmlConverter(), FLEXMARK_FACTORY.getMarkdownParser()));
065  }
066
067  /**
068   * Convert the provided markdown string into markup.
069   *
070   * @param markdown
071   *          the markup
072   * @return the markup instance
073   */
074  @NonNull
075  public static MarkupLine fromMarkdown(@NonNull String markdown) {
076    return new MarkupLine(parseMarkdown(markdown, FLEXMARK_FACTORY.getMarkdownParser()));
077  }
078
079  @Override
080  public FlexmarkFactory getFlexmarkFactory() {
081    return FLEXMARK_FACTORY;
082  }
083
084  /**
085   * Construct a new single line markup instance.
086   *
087   * @param astNode
088   *          the parsed markup AST
089   */
090  protected MarkupLine(@NonNull Document astNode) {
091    super(astNode);
092    Node child = astNode.getFirstChild();
093    if (child instanceof Block && child.getNext() != null) {
094      throw new IllegalStateException("multiple blocks not allowed");
095    } // else empty markdown
096  }
097
098  @Override
099  public MarkupLine copy() {
100    // TODO: find a way to do a deep copy
101    // this is a shallow copy that uses the same underlying Document object
102    return new MarkupLine(getDocument());
103  }
104
105  @Override
106  public boolean isBlock() {
107    return false;
108  }
109}
